field.label: Inner-Tunnel LDAP
field.help: This enables LDAP authentication in inner-tunnel configuration. This is needed for protocols requiring encrypted authentication like 802.1X.

field.label: Server
field.help: Set the hostname or IP address to connect to.

field.label: Bind User
field.help: Username to bind to LDAP, same format as in Base DN.

field.label: Base DN
field.help: Set the Base DN in format dc=example,dc=domain,dc=com

field.label: User Filter
field.help: Set the filter to search for users, for Active Directory change uid to samaccountname.

field.label: Group Filter
field.help: Filter for group objects, should match all available group objects a user might be a member of.
